fields.headline: Pick of the week: Theatre
fields.bodyText: Fall Traverse Theatre, Edinburgh Zinnie Harris considers the aftermath of war in this new thriller directed by Dominic Hill. Arcadia Pitlochry Festival Theatre Tom Stoppard's greatest and most lovable play revived. Great, even for maths dunces. New Electric Ballroom Traverse Theatre, Edinburgh A glitter-dusted fable about lost dreams from the brilliant Enda Walsh. Much Ado About Nothing Botanic Gardens, Glasgow The Bard In The Botanics season does the battle of the sexes promenade style. Pornography Traverse Theatre, Edinburgh Simon Stephens looks at the way we live now in play set during the summer of the Olympic bid.
